page.title: 09USHERCOMBE FARM
page.content: THE ROGERS LIVE HERE. IT IS MAINLY A DAIRY FARM.THEY HAVE FRESIAN COWS AND LIMOUSIN CALVES,ONE BULL,AROUND 7O MILKING COWS,9O CALVES.THERE ARE 11 CATS,1 DOG & 1O CHICKENS.THEY GO TO BANBURY MARKET.THEY HORSE RACE,PLAY CRICKET,HUNT AND EACH YEAR HOLD A CHASE WHICH PRINCE CHARLES,MICHAEL AND PRINCESS ANNE HAVE BEEN IN. THE OLD USHERCOMBE FARM IS HALF A MILE AWAY AND IS MADE OF LIME STONE FROM SWALCLIFFE & IRONSTONE FROM USHERCOMBE SPINNEY.THE ORIGINAL FARM WAS HERE IN THE FIRST DOMESDAY BOOK.IT WAS THE FIRST FARM IN THE PARISH AND WAS A CHURCH FARM. THE NAME USHERCOMBE IS SAXON,MAYBE USHER HAS SOMETHING TO DO WITH THE CHURCH. THERE IS A ROMAN CAMP ON THEIR LAND AND ALSO THEY HAVE THE SPRING WHICH IS THE RISING OF THE RIVER STOUR.
